A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was really impressed on how well this movie turned out. The color pallet was absolutely beautiful\, but I wasn't impressed with how they made this movie a SJW recruitment film. That isn't what Star Wars is about\, but with today's society we have so many groups that want to impose their views on others so I have to look past all that crap to see the story for what it is. I will say it is confusing on the direction of this film and where it is leading us. I do feel there was some unresolved issues from TFA and TLJ like for Rey's family which is still not clear as it doesn't convey the linage. Plus\, how can you believe a word Kylo says?
